Mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ na akụ na ụba na-ezo aka na ònyìnyé Assigned Amount Units (AAU) nyèrè màkà mbelata nke Green House Gas (GHG) n'etiti mba ndị bụbu Soviet Bloc kemgbe afọ 1990
Ọdịda nke Soviet Union dugara na nnukwu mgbanwe na deindustrialization nke ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bụbu Soviet Bloc
Mgbè a tụlere Kyoto Protocol, e nwèrè ọtụtụ usoro nke nyere ohere màkà ahia nke ego ikuku

Ihe ndị a gụnyere ego ndị e mepụtara n'okpuru ndokwa Joint Initiative (JI): Emission Reduction Unit credits; Clean Development Mechanism (CDM): Certified Emission Redulation credits; na Assigned Amount Units (AAU) nke a makwaara ugbu a dị ka Hot Air na post Soviet
E nyèrè Russia ihe ndị a dị ka ihe mkpali ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ahụ
Ndị ọkachamara na-ahụ màkà mgbanwe ihu igwe na-akatọ ihe nrite ndị a dị ka ụzọ mba ga-esi zụta ụzọ ha si eme ihe iji dozie mgbanwe ihu igwe
